content:
# API Documentation

[INFO]
This documentation is only visible to users with API access.
[/INFO]

## Authentication

All API requests require authentication using Bearer tokens:

[COPY]
Authorization: Bearer your-api-token-here
[/COPY]

## Endpoints

[TABS]
[TAB name="(fa)users(/fa) Users"]
### GET /api/users

Retrieve all users in the system.

[CODEBLOCK title="users.js"]
```javascript
const response = await fetch('/api/users', {
  headers: {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token
  }
});
const users = await response.json();
```
[/CODEBLOCK]
[/TAB]

[TAB name="(fa)database(/fa) Database"]
### POST /api/data

Create new database entries.

[WARNING]
This endpoint requires admin privileges.
[/WARNING]

[CODEBLOCK title="create-data.js"]
```javascript
const newData = await fetch('/api/data', {
  method: 'POST',
  headers: {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + adminToken,
    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
  },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    name: 'Example',
    value: 'test'
  })
});
```
[/CODEBLOCK]
[/TAB]
[/TABS]

## Rate Limits

[TIMELINE]
[EVENT date="Tier 1" open]
- 100 requests per hour
- Basic endpoints only
[/EVENT]

[EVENT date="Tier 2"]
- 1,000 requests per hour  
- All endpoints
- Priority support
[/EVENT]

[EVENT date="Enterprise"]
- Unlimited requests
- Custom endpoints
- Dedicated support
[/EVENT]
[/TIMELINE]
